metadata.Title: CVE-2018-0501 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - high.
metadata.Description:
The mirror:// method implementation in Advanced Package Tool (APT) 1.6.x before 1.6.4 and 1.7.x before 1.7.0~alpha3 mishandles gpg signature verification for the InRelease file of a fallback mirror, aka mirrorfail.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-0501` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

apt - 1.6.3ubuntu0.1
apt-transport-https - 1.6.3ubuntu0.1
apt-utils - 1.6.3ubuntu0.1
libapt-inst2.0 - 1.6.3ubuntu0.1
libapt-pkg5.0 - 1.6.3ubuntu0.1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: apt package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.6.3ubuntu0.1').
